text: William James Pascrell Jr. (January 25, 1937 - August 21, 2024) was an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for until his death. He represented from January 1997 until the redistricting of January 2013. He was a member of the Democratic Party. In July 2024, Pascrell was hospitalized in Paterson, New Jersey after having a respiratory tract infection. He was released in early August, however was hospitalized again in Livingston, New Jersey. Pascrell died on August 21, 2024, at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman Bill Pascrell official U.S. House site *Bill Pascrell for Congress * * * Category:1937 births Category:2024 deaths Category:United States representatives from New Jersey Category:American mayors Category:American Roman Catholics Category:People from Paterson, New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from respiratory tract infection
title: Bill Pascrell
